111.content: You are now a hedgehog but who are you?
111.title: Hedgehogs in the house

1111.content:
Sonic was running. No surprise there, but, unlike his other runs recently, which had been consumed with thinking, this one was for taking action. Sonic's direction took him toward someone, a person he had been thinking about.

Sonic's run took him toward...
1111.title: Sonic

11112.content: Is it Amy Rose or someone else?
11112.title: A Female Friend's house

choices: A swirling Pink and Blue diamond
An ancient cylinder covered in runes
A stone ring with two metal arrows chasing each other
111121.content:
"Hey Sonic!"
"Amy, we need to talk."
"Oh no. What's wrong sonic?"
"The past year with you has been wonderful and I think it's time I took our relationship a bit more serious."
Her heart raced, "What do you mean?"
"We already spend so much time together. I don't want to waste a single second of my life apart from you. Why don't we move in together?"
She gasps, "Yay! Yes, Sonic! I thought you would never ask! You're welcome to move into my place? Pretty, please!"
They spent the rest of the afternoon moving Sonic's things to Amy's house. In only a handful of quick trips sonic had made it official. While finding places to put his trophys, Sonic noticed a shelf he never really paid any attention to. A short shelf in the corner of the living room containing a handful of old and bizarre relics. "Hey Amy! When did you get these?"
"OH! Those are souvenirs from some of our adventure. I wanted something to remember all of the wonderful places we've been."
"Huh, That must have been before we started dating. Do they do anything?"
"I dunno, I just thought they looked cool"
Sonic picked one up.
111121.title: Amy Rose

1111213.content:
"This one is kinda neat!" He said holding the ring up.
"You and your rings sonic. Can you put that down. I don't want you breaking it."
"I'm not going to break it" Sonic said spinning the ring on his finger.
Amy started reaching for it, "Sonic please don't!"
As soon as she touched it, a bolt of lightning shot down their spines and they blacked out.
A few moments later Sonic sat up, "Sonic are you alright?" He quickly looked around the room, his eyes darting everywhere. Confirming that sonic was nowhere to be found his eyes stopped at the sight of Amy sitting up on the floor.
"Yeah, Amy where are you?" She froze at the sight of Sonic. They looked at each other for a moment.
"Are you Amy?" Amy said.
She nodded "Yeah, is that you Sonic?"
"Yeah it's me" he said from Amy's body. "I think that ring switched us"
"It looks like it." Amy said from Sonic's body.
"Do you want to switch back?" Sonic said.
Amy looked at the ring for a second, then looked at her new body. "Hold on one second, I want to try something." She ran out the door at sonic speeds. Leaving sonic by himself. He looked down at Amy's dress. He loved seeing her in this dress and her big red boots. He stood up admiring his new body. The body of his girlfriend. He walked to the bedroom and gazed at himself in the full length mirror. He shifted his weight to one side and put his hands on his hips like Amy. "Amy sure is a cutie. I hope she hasn't gotten into any trouble with my body." He twirled around in her skirt. "Ohh Sonic your soo fast", he giggled at himself saying that. "I hope she comes back soon, but in the mean time." I think I'll have some fun.
1111213.title: A stone ring with two metal arrows chasing each...

11112222222.title: Create you Own Character!

choices: Go Back To Shadow's House And Rest
Go Up The Street And Wait For Sonic
1112.content:
I was lonely. Forsooth it all if I admit that to anyone I know. I can't even think of what would happen If I did. Is there a reason why I'm by myself? Or is it just cruel fate that decides I should just rot here? I don't even feel like myself. Like I'm somebody else. but still the same, if that even made sense....

I guess I'm for myself to blame. Why else would I be here, glumly sitting in this tree, admiring the relationships everyone had? Just looking to my left, I see that accursed Bat clamoring all over her little jewel. That Echidna....what was his name? Chuckles? Something like that. It pains me to think that romance comes so fluently to them. For someone like me, it would be like climbing a mountain with no help except for my teeth. I observe some more, wondering to myself why it's like this, why my miscreant friends have love in the air all around.

I'm sorry, I'm getting a tad ahead of myself. You see, we're at a picnic, a small little gathering before we all set our opposite ways again. I have my own house in the very thick of Station Square, I don't use it that often as I should. Which somehow made me think of one certain being at this position.

Who else but Sonic The Hedgehog? He loves traveling. Heck, he's on perpetual vacation when he's not roaming the planet stopping evil. Evil....Can't believe I used to be evil. Just thinking about that word brings a soft chuckle to my lips. Too bad I'm not evil anymore, it was fun, but it had its ups and downs. For example, if I wasn't evil, I never would of met him....

Wait. Where did that even come from?? I'm sitting here, thinking about love, then HE enters my mind. Well great, now I'm panicking. I can't see straight. I become very close minded when I can't focus or see, I almost automatically shut down when something like this happens. Plus add to the fact that I haven't been feeling very good at all. I think I may have gotten sick over the course of last week.

Hnnnghg.

Yeah...That was the ground. I forgot what it felt like. I guess its good enough that the ground is covered by soft grass. The initial impact hurt worse then when I got my first shot.

Now I hear footsteps. "Shadow! You okay?!" And that was Sonic himself. Well, gee faker. I just fell from a tree, I'm not responding, what else could be going on?

Next thing I know, I'm being turned over and the sun's in my eyes, I squint them shut hard and grit my teeth. I could feel his hands on my forehead, he removed one glove and placed it on my head. Was it just me, or did his hand feel soft and cool?....

"S-Shadow, your burning up." Well, I guess so. I felt like I was in a steam room right now. Add extra hot-rocks. Then I could tell he was trying to feel for any cuts or bruises on my torso. Now, with the current situation, I wouldn't mind this If it was a medical situation, maybe it was, but thats when I realized he was getting a little to close for my own comfort to one area of privacy.

I don't think he noticed, or at least pretend to not notice, but I could feel his hand getting to one spot right when the bottom of my stomach was. Oh no, if he keeps going, he's going to find out....

I suddenly jerked under his grasp, opening my eyes with great force on my part, and suddenly rolling onto him. I glare into his eyes with my crimson iris, his shell-shocked green ones staring right back at me.

I'm so sorry Sonic, I have to do this....

"What in the reddest of red hells are you doing, Hedgehog?" I rasp out, fatigue evident in my voice. I could see he was trying to come up with an answer.

"I-I was trying to see if your okay! Why-" But I felt a pang of regretability when I grasped a scruff of fur with both of my hands, lifting the upper half of his body with my strength.

"Do you hear me clear? Don't ever touch me again. I'm fine." I drop him to the ground with force. I had to make it look believable. That's when his pink harpy entered the scene, furious that I touched her 'Sonikku'.

"Shadow! What was that for?! He only tried to help you, and you repay him by shoving him to the ground? You should grateful!"

Truth was, I am grateful. Really, but I had to keep my secret, I can't let them find out. "Really. Of course you'd say anything to protect him. you hated my guts from day one. I can tell."

I look back at Sonic, peering up at me with his elbows propping himself up off the ground. His mouth hung open. I could only guess he was thinking I just pulled a Double Whammy on him and his 'Grifriend'....


......I'm hanging around him too much.....

"I'm going home, you'd better not follow me Faker."

I start to walk away, my eyes peering off to the side if he did follow me or not. Well, Guess I should get home. Then again, he could just follow me.

What should I do?
1112.title: Shadow: What Could He Be Hiding?

choices: He was getting better now that he's away from sonic.

1131.content: Like any other day Knuckles is guarding the Master Emerald on the lonely floating Island. But someone comes to see Knuckles, who is it?
1131.title: Knuckles

11312.content:
Knuckles was leaning back on his Master Emerald, basking in it's glow as he stared up into the ever blue sky. He did enjoy his peaceful guardian existence on Angel Island but sometime it did get terribly lonely.

A rustle in the bushes immediately put Knuckles on guard. If something was there after the Master Emerald it would have to deal with HIM first! He leapt into the bushes tackling whatever being that had been watching him, pinning it to the ground. He blushed when he saw that it was Rouge staring up at him with a playful smile.

"Geez Rouge!! Do you know what I could've done to you?!" Asked Knuckles as he helped her up.

"Promises! Promises!" teased Rouge.

Knuckles blushed lightly.

"Oh you! What am I going to do with you?"

Rouge playfully threw her arms around his neck.

"I have a couple of suggestions."
11312.title: Rouge the Bat

*Today's Amy's birthday and Me,Bunni,Sonic and the others will do what it takes*

Sonic: Okay guys we've got work to do

Cream: I'll help cook

Cheese: CHAO CHAO

Nitro: Ok what do I help with

Sally: Nitro,Bunni and Tails you are on decorations

Nitro,Bunni and Tails: Okay

Bunni: Nitro can you get that for me

Nitro: Sure

*Nitro gives her the decoration*

Bunni: Thanks

Nitro: No problem

Tails: Finished

Nitro: Me too

Bunni: Me three

Nitro: Let's Check In with sonic and sally

Nitro: Sonic we're done

Sonic: Okay

3 hours later

Cream: Amy come with us

Cheese: CHAO

Amy: Okay

All: Surprise

Amy: Yay

All: Happy birthday

Amy: Thanks Guys

Bunni and Nitro: Don't thank us thank Sonic

Amy:Thanks Sonic

Sonic: Your Welcome

Amy and Sonic: *Kisses*

All: Awwwwww

Nitro: Happy Birthday Amy

Amy:thanks

Amy: Great Decorations who did it

Nitro: Me,Bunni and Tails

Amy: Thanks

121312231.content:
Bernadette came back to her dorm from her morning jog to find her roommate waiting for her “Aleena? What’s up?” The sporty Hedgehog had never seen her roommate in the dorms this late in the day, the rocker Hedgehog was usually out with her band. But here she was, messy quill style and all.
Aleena shifted nervously “Bernie... I have something I have to tell you....” she’d been keeping this secret for a long time...

Vanilla was wearing a special little outfit under a concealing robe that she couldn’t wait to show her girlfriend. Finally Vanilla could stop fantasizing as there was a knock at the door, Vanilla lunged for the door and opened it, “What took you, my sexy wolf of the night?” She blurted out before seeing her guest...

A tee shirt and jean shorts
12412232.content: Lupe adjusted her jacket, it was a bit small on her and the zipper was straining against the wolf’s adult breasts. “Sorry, Darling I had some trouble keeping these on.” Her Pants slid down a little from a tail flick, Vanilla pulled her lover in before closing the door “Oh that’s fine, I don’t think you’ll be wearing them much longer...” the horny mother rabbit removed her own robe to show what she’d been hiding underneath...

1241223252.content:

But the crowning achievement was the white bikini top, “Sorry, rouge lent me these... I don’t think she realized we weren’t the same size...” Vanilla explained.
The wolf gulped, not the same size? That bras got to be three sizes small! she thought as she watched the rabbit rub her nipples, the only part the bikini managed to cover of the Bunnies large breasts.
Both Lupe and Vanilla were breathing in heavily as they took eachothers outfits in. They were both pent up adults and this was their night to finally get the relief they needed.

1252.title: species of your choice

info.brief_description: This is basically an interactive love story for any sonic character you choose or create.
info.description:
Choose a boy or girl and create a love story that will expand as you make choices.

You can choose any sonic character (For old ones, you must have a reason for them to be back).

You can also create your own but that's your decision. You're not allow to make it short but if its sweet, then I'll let it slide.

I look forward to seeing all the guys and girls kicking it off!

I want to thank MarioDS01 for suggesting a new idea for my story and from now on, there can be transgendering in your story so that should help you get creative.

MarioDS01 also suggested lowering the rating so I'm allowing younger viewers. As always, show me your moves!

Hi guys! I'm updating again because today, a user named Mdizzle suggested the use of crossover pairings so if anyone likes crossover pairings, let me know and for now, I'll allow crossover pairings but I need to be convinced if this is a good idea for this project so I need your input.

Hi. I just came to say that I'm testing something out but it involves bumping up the rating so if anyone is oppose to this, respond to me by e-mail.
